snippet: Fitzpatrick, the Jets’ quarterback, who has a torn ligament in his left thumb, is looking to maximize his recovery time before the team’s next game.
abstract: Jets quarterback Ryan Fitzpatrick, who originally pledged to postpone surgery on his torn thumb ligament until after season, is now expected to have procedure after game against Buffalo.
lead_paragraph: Fitzpatrick, the Jets’ quarterback, who has a torn ligament in his left thumb, is looking to maximize his recovery time before the team’s next game.

headline.main: Ryan Fitzpatrick Likely to Have Thumb Surgery After Game
headline.print_headline: Fitzpatrick Likely to Have Thumb Surgery After Game vs. Bills
